221b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sus kyang rnam par
221b5(mdo 'grel): shes te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad rnams dang / rnam par shes pas ma sheso// so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mche dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma sheso//
221b6(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / tshad mod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis mashes
222a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par thar pa brgya dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyi dang / mtshan mA med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma she so// stong pa nyid thams
222a2(mdo 'grel): cad dang / tingange 'dzin thams cad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mA 'dres pa bcwo brgya
222a3(mdo 'grel): kyis ma sheso// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa po ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
222a4(mdo 'grel): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byed pa po med pa'i zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po yin no// // 'di dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs gsungs so// // rab 'byor gyis gsol
222a5(mdo 'grel): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
222a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mo spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
222b1(mdo 'grel): pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod do// de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lami spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de
222b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam dang / yang dag par spong ba dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
222b3(mdo 'grel): dang / dbang po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams la mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams lnga mi spyod nA shes rab kyi
222b4(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mo med pa dang // smon pa med pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rlob kyi pha rol tu phyin
222b5(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang drug par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222b6(mdo 'grel): la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs po'i sbyor ba yin no// // gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag
223a1(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do// gzugs bdag ces bya ba
223a2(mdo 'grel): 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
223a3(mdo 'grel): dang / rnam par shes po rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // rnam par shes pa ba de zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes par mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shrIs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
223a5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel por 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / dran pa nye bar gzhig pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
223a6(mdo 'grel): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dong / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang
223b1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
223b2(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
223b3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/
223b4(mdo 'grel): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldog ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya ba ri mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
223b5(mdo 'grel): gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag po 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'o ma/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzugs de ni med do// gong rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/
223b6(mdo 'grel): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni med do// de bzhin du gang rtag
224a1(mdo 'grel): pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par
224a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gan/
224a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
224a4(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de ni med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la so// dri sbyor ba yin no// // bam
224a5(mdo 'grel): sum cu dgu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224a6(mdo 'grel): byin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o nye bya bar po spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin dums pa dang / bsdus
224b1(mdo 'grel): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang
224b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
224b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi sbyod na shes rab kyi
224b4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / byas ma gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthor gyis gnas pa'i
224b5(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol pa la spyod do// de bzhin
224b6(mdo 'grel): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na
225a1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs po zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs
225a2(mdo 'grel): su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin pa'i phyiraro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yong su ma rdzogs
225a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyi ra ro zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang / rdzogs pa gang yin pa nga
225a4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yin no// /
225a5(mdo 'grel): de skad ces bka' stsal-i pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dad ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lo chags pa dang ma chags pa
225a6(mdo 'grel): legs par bstan pa ngo mtshar tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sems dpa'
225b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa
225b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dong / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa dang bcas po dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
225b3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// mi tshogs pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags pa dang / bcas pa dang
225b4(mdo 'grel): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byin pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod ni shes rab kyi
225b5(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyi ro pa la spyod do// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtsonA 'ogrus dang / bsdum gtan dang / gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa chags pa zhes
225b6(mdo 'grel): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
226a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa du ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod nA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
226a2(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags po zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
226a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang
226a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar
226a5(mdo 'grel): 'du shes pa medo// tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshwa la da na da ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel
226a6(mdo 'grel): par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong po nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnam dang /
226b1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / so so yang dag par rigs/
226b2(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
226b3(mdo 'grel): pa med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ga phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyi dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs pa dang
226b4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba yin no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
226b5(mdo 'grel): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib/ ma ba ston kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongasu mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongasu mi 'phel ba ngo/
226b6(mdo 'grel): mtshar che'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongasu
227a1(mdo 'grel): mi 'gribar ma bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel lo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
227a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing na mkha'i bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang / na mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod pas yongasu 'phel ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas/
227a3(mdo 'grel): yongasu 'grib pa med do// na mkha' ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba yino// // rab 'byor 'di lha skye dper
227a4(mdo 'grel): nAHsgyu ma'i skyes bu ni bsngags pa badz+rod kyang 'phel ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongasu 'grib pa med do// bsngags pA brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang
227a5(mdo 'grel): khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos nyid rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i sbyor ba yin no// // rab 'byor/
227a6(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan na sems zhum pa dang / g.yengs par mi 'gyur
227b1(mdo 'grel): bA dang pashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir brtson par byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dkA ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ste byang chub sems dpa'
227b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'i slad du ste/ nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchi so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis
227b3(mdo 'grel): so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ma mchi so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchisaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gzugasu
227b4(mdo 'grel): btags ma mchis so// tshor bar ma mchisaso// 'du shes su mA mchis/ 'du byed rnams su ma mchis/ na mkha' la ni rnam parwa shes par btagos pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid du brtag pa ma mchis so// /
227b5(mdo 'grel): phyi stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du btags po ma mchisaso// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sa du btags pa ma mchis so// namakha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam su btags pa
227b6(mdo 'grel): ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam dang / lam rnams su btag pa ma mchis so//
228a1(mdo 'grel): na mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha'
228a2(mdo 'grel): la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur btags pa ma mchi so// na mkha' la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su btags pa ma
228a3(mdo 'grel): mchis so// namakha' la ni ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnamasu btags pa ma mchi so// nam mkha' la ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du btags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' lan de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur btags pa ma
228a4(mdo 'grel): mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir btags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
228a5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni lan cig phyir 'ong gi 'bras du btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni man cig phyir mi song ba'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni dgra bcom pa nyid du btags pa ma
228a6(mdo 'grel): mchis so// nam mkha' la ni rang byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha
228b1(mdo 'grel): 'di 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni nam mkha'i don du sbyor bar 'tshal/ bskul bar 'tshal/ khyab par 'tshal ba dag ste/
228b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa de dag ni na mkha' yongasu dgrol bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa de dag ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags te/
228b3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba dka' ba'i sbyor ba yin no// // bcom ldan 'das sems
228b4(mdo 'grel): can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' bar snang la teg par 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor bar dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no// // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
228b5(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob po'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
228b6(mdo 'grel): khams 'di/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing lhar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yongasu gang bar gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang
229a1(mdo 'grel): bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang bcom
229a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das sems can gyi khams lnga 'bri ba 'am gang bur btags pa mi ganga'o// de ci'i slad du zha na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad dang / sems canA dben pa'i slang du'o// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang
229a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di lta ste dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lA ma/ bu ram gi shing tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing lhar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongasu gong bar gyur la de
229a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su
229a5(mdo 'grel): mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can gyi khams la 'bri ba 'am gang bar btags pa mi gda'o// da ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs/
229a6(mdo 'grel): des na sems can rnams kyi slang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o//
229b1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni las bya dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no// // de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung por gdags su yod/ ting
229b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyi phung por gdags su yod do// shes rab kyi phung por gdagasu yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung por gdagasu yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung por gdagasu yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags
229b3(mdo 'grel): su yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gdag su yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdag su yod/ rang byang chub tu gdag su yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
229b4(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu su dgadags su sngo/ kon ma rmo tsu bdog du yong tshwa DI 'gro la bcwo gangs su blo/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gdag su yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa
229b5(mdo 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni don yod pa'i sbyor ba yin no// // de nasde lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di 'i skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
229b6(mdo 'grel): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yid na de gang la brtson por byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya bar sems
230a1(mdo 'grel): pa dag ni na mkha' la brtson pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la shes rab kyi pha rol
230a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba ba ji
230a3(mdo 'grel): lha ga zhig du bgyi/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / skye bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rdza su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
230a4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba~M de lta bu'i chos yang dag par d+has su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shI ka ga le ti rigs kyi bu 'amo/ rigs kyi bu mo dzI skad bstan pa'i shes
230a5(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na du nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glag tshol ba
230a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa de dag ni na mkha'
230b1(mdo 'grel): la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar sems pa'o// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra baR+Shan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer rnams la bsrung ba
230b2(mdo 'grel): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyi smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nu so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
230b3(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka da ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin
230b4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dngo / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
230b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyob pa dang / smra bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa lnga mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka da ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis
230b6(mdo 'grel): chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi
231a1(mdo 'grel): nus po rarab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko ru shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / smra bar gang sems
231a2(mdo 'grel): ba ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can dub pa'i skal ba tsan du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yin no// // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na byung
231a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyanA lta bu dang / gzugs brnya na lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lha/
231a4(mdo 'grel): bu dang / sprul pa lta bur chos thams cad yongasu shes par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sno 'a sidri'u chen blo rmo li nr-i me sem su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byeng / de
231a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du sprul pa'i bar du rloms semasu mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so chos thams cad sgyum bu dang / chos thams
231a6(mdo 'grel): cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongasu shes par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba yon te/ 'di dag gis ni sbyor ba gsungs so// // ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems
231b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su
231b2(mdo 'grel): mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byeng / sprul pas rlom sems
231b3(mdo 'grel): su mi byed / sprul pa bdag gi R+R-i samra su mi byed/ sprub pa la rje som su mi bya// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rloms su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes
231b4(mdo 'grel): bya la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasasu mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas
231b5(mdo 'grel): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du so so ba dngong // bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba'i
231b6(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams ca dang / ting 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo tha dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
232a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
232a2(mdo 'grel): sa pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa
232a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
232a4(mdo 'grel): gyis rlom sems mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lalaM la rlom sem su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
232a5(mdo 'grel): sprul pa la rlom sem su mi byedo zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid yin no// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu
232a6(mdo 'grel): rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams
232b1(mdo 'grel): dang / tshangs chan pa rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi ris kyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
232b2(mdo 'grel): de lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi
232b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas stong gi yi ge 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongasu zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po
232b4(mdo 'grel): brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yong su zhu ba byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa sems kyis mthong bar 'gyur to// de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs rnams dang /
232b5(mdo 'grel): mtshams rnams thams cad na sangs rgyas stong gi yi ge 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / thams cad
232b6(mdo 'grel): du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid zhu ba byed cing chos ston pa mdzad pa rnams sems kyi mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab
233a1(mdo 'grel): 'byor byang stems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas twa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
233a2(mdo 'grel): pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'a la de bzhin gshegos pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyogaso 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang
233a3(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyuraro zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug po dbang du gyur pa shes par byang ba
233a4(mdo 'grel): yin no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i
233a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla ni mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chang par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
233a6(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag
233b1(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro/
233b2(mdo 'grel): gzugs cings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par
233b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bang zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhwa ba ba'i/ bdag rje bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am/
233b4(mdo 'grel): grol shes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ ngo ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
233b5(mdo 'grel): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mya 'ongasde pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du so so ba dang / sdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
233b6(mdo 'grel): skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cadang dang / stong pa nyid thams cang / ting 'dzin tha mas cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cang dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
234a1(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar
234a2(mdo 'grel): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
234a3(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes pa zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba
234a4(mdo 'grel): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo ra gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
234a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs
234a6(mdo 'grel): shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyuraro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar cho sa ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
234b1(mdo 'grel): du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i badren pa rnams dang / tshad medapa
234b2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
234b3(mdo 'grel): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yong dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
234b4(mdo 'grel): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par ngag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis
234b5(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongasasu dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yong su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang /
234b6(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang / 'du byang rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung
235a1(mdo 'grel): bu rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang
235a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam
235a3(mdo 'grel): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yong su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
235a4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rdza su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
235a5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshe ri ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags// de bzhin du phung po dang / kha
235a6(mdo 'grel): dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam
235b1(mdo 'grel): gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtsham med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
235b2(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag
235b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i slad du shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs po med pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi//
235b4(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa mi
235b5(mdo 'grel): rnam par bshes pa yong su dag pa'o// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mtshad dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams
235b6(mdo 'grel): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
236a1(mdo 'grel): brgyad dang / mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma snyed pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyarna mas
236a2(mdo 'grel): ngar mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mong ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs
236a3(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
236a4(mdo 'grel): po nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjesu shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
236a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na namakhwa' ying su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni na mkhyen
236a6(mdo 'grel): ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yino//
236b1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor na mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
236b2(mdo 'grel): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos
236b3(mdo 'grel): shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad
236b4(mdo 'grel): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu de dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag
236b5(mdo 'grel): pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rdzasu shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // gang rab 'byor na mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dge pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
236b6(mdo 'grel): ji ltar na na mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji
237a1(mdo 'grel): lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor na mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung lnga rjes su
237a2(mdo 'grel): shes pa yin no// // gang rab 'byor na mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nan mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i
237a3(mdo 'grel): slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams
237a4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // gong na mkha' dmigasu med pa'i phyir shes rab
237a5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
237a6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gang yang dmigasu med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigasu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
237b1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
237b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchi/
237b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam pa
237b4(mdo 'grel): dag pa'i phyir shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi
237b5(mdo 'grel): gang la lo zhigi shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang b+hu dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom lnga 'angs de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur//
237b6(mdo 'grel): rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nang dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lus rgas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/
238a1(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i skad bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
238a2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / gnas gtsang mya' ras kyi bar gya lha rnams dang / gan sde gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'breng bar 'gyu ro// gang na tshisna smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'om/ rigs kyi bu mo ngas shes rab kyi pha
238a3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang ches brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshigs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di skyon
238a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom
238a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri lha'i 'khor gyi
238a6(mdo 'grel): mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad mong pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ste/ shes rab
238b1(mdo 'grel): kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rdzasu shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las
238b2(mdo 'grel): yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// glu shin rje'i 'jig rten las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// dbul po las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyu la rigs stso la chen por
238b3(mdo 'grel): skye bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs sA laM chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs sA lnga chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyu la tshwa ni bzhi'i ras kyi lha rnamasu skye bar bye po 'du shes mod 'du she yed min skye mched
238b4(mdo 'grel): kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi'i dra ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
238b5(mdo 'grel): nyid dang / rang byang chub dang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do// de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge pa bcu'i las kyi lham rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir
238b6(mdo 'grel): ded la bslabs thos rgyal rigs sA chen po rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum
239a1(mdo 'grel): cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' bya rnams dang / gzhan 'phrulta dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs 'khar gyi lha rnams yang nga/
239a2(mdo 'grel): tshungs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// 'od chung gi lha rnams yod do/ tshong mang 'od kyi lha rnams yod // 'od gsal gyi lha rnams
239a3(mdo 'grel): ngododage chung gI lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do// bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yo
239a4(mdo 'grel): gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yong ngo // mi che ba'i lha rnams yid ngo // mI gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// rab lta'i lha rnams yod ngo // legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod// na mkha' mtha' yas
239a5(mdo 'grel): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched kyi lha rnams yong // chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnam yod do// 'du shes meng 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun tu
239a6(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yong ngo //
239b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan bzhirnamA yod do// tshad med pa bzhi rnams yodado// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyim pa yong ngo // tshul khrim
239b2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// thabs mkhwa sI pha rol tu phyin/
239b3(mdo 'grel): ba yod do// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// dran po nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
239b4(mdo 'grel): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
239b5(mdo 'grel): stong nyid kyi bar du yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do// rnam par thar pA brgyad rnams yod do// mthar gyis gnus pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
239b6(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod ngo // mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do// ting 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu rnams yod do// de bzhin
240a1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do//
240a2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do// sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do// chos dkon mchog
240a3(mdo 'grel): yod do// dge 'dun dkon/ mchog yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshwas de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de bas na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes
240a4(mdo 'grel): brjod la lo ches shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byung ba'am/ yongasu gtsu
240a5(mdo 'grel): baba'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni 'di ltar skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongasasu gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do// rab 'byor
240a6(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'ang li ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa lasadag pa lag mi dge pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med paM dang / kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha ni ma tho ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
240b1(mdo 'grel): pa med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
240b2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni gang gis kyang gos pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
240b3(mdo 'grel): gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// /
240b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gal tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ da ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ da ltar dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shas ra
240b5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o// rgya rjis su ma dza 'o// 'dus pacoM sa 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir
240b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
241a1(mdo 'grel): zhing du 'gro'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rje su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yI nu te/ 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yino// // rab 'byor yang shes
241a2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ mi ston par byed pa ma yin/ ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/
241a3(mdo 'grel): skye bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ chang par byad pa ma yin/ rtag par byed pa ma yin/ don gcig pa ma yin/ don sna tshogs pa ma yin/ 'ong bar byed pa ma yin// 'gro ba byed pa ma yim kun nyon mongs
241a4(mdo 'grel): byed pa ma yin+da/ rnam par byung bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs ma yin/ da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad pa/
241a5(mdo 'grel): shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byis pa yongasasu rdzogs par bstan po ste/ dang po'o// // rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa 'am
241a6(mdo 'grel): gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'das par byed pa 'am/ gnas par byed pa mo yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'das par byed pa 'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin
241b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang /
241b2(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin+na pa ster bar byed pa ShA ma/ 'phrog par byed pa mA yinA/ nung stong pa nyid ster byed pA ma yin/ 'phrog par byeng ba ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed
241b3(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong po nyid ster bar byed po ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ster bar byed po 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
241b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bdeni pa bzhi rnam dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
241b5(mdo 'grel): dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin// /
241b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpal sa bcu ster bar byed pa 'am/ dbang po dang / ster ba 'am/ 'phrog por byeng pa ma yin/ de bzhin gsheg pa stobs bcu ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar
242a1(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams
242a2(mdo 'grel): ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa mi yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
242a3(mdo 'grel): bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pA 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yinA/ ti 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog
242a4(mdo 'grel): par byed pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par/
242a5(mdo 'grel): byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbu du rgyas pa yongasu rdzogs par bstan pa ste// gnyis pa'o// // bam po bzhi bcu pa/ rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
242a6(mdo 'grel): rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa mo yin/ so sI skye bo'i chos ster ba 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshe rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin
242b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs
242b2(mdo 'grel): pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
242b3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par thugs su chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tau mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i bu
242b4(mdo 'grel): brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de gra sha phyung nus kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI kA dang / man dA rA ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'ongs kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan
242b6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'i ngo ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor bar
243a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i phyir nye ba gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor
243a2(mdo 'grel): bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar dgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong du gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
243a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa dang /
243a4(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi steng // ngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa po nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid po stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams dran
243a5(mdo 'grel): sto bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi stong ngo // de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // /
243a6(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
243b1(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
243b2(mdo 'grel): par 'jug dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams
243b3(mdo 'grel): mngon pa shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting 'dzin thams cad ti nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzugs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
243b4(mdo 'grel): bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par
243b5(mdo 'grel): rigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhubs
243b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam/
244a1(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang cho
244a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang
244a3(mdo 'grel): chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyo ba mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba 'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yangado yongasu mthong ba yang ma mchis yongasu ma
244a4(mdo 'grel): mthong ba yang ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na// de ni 'di ltar gang bskor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigasu ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mdzin
244a5(mdo 'grel): par grub pa ste/ stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyid pa 'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis par bskor bar bgyi ba 'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba 'am lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi bsku
244a6(mdo 'grel): bar bgyi ba ma lags so// de ltar na shes rab rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / brjod pa dang / btags dang / rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dkrol ba dang / mtshon
244b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyis dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma
244b2(mdo 'grel): bzung / gang sus kyang ma bzung de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so// gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni sus yang sbyin pa'i pha rol gnasu
244b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan po ste gsum pa'o// // 'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs so// 'phags
244b4(mdo 'grel): bla bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lta ba mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rdza su 'brangs nus dag par btugs pa las// thams cad shes pas dbang du byas pa spyod pa'i khyad par gyi lde'u/
244b5(mdo 'grel): ste gsum pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin b+ha 'di ni ma mi myos pa'i pha rol tu phyin
244b6(mdo 'grel): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na ma~M bAn+de bI phyiro// rab 'byor gyi gsol ga bac+doMs 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
245a1(mdo 'grel): sbrul ya chos thams cad mi dmig snga mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
245a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/
245a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA lding ni gzhi ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
245a4(mdo 'grel): 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyi ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ni na mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
245a5(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du mi mchis pa'i pha
245a6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
245b1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni mi nyam mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmig su myed pa'i phyiro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
245b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyi ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
245b3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
245b4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zad pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
245b5(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
245b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
246a1(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab po dmigasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor
246a2(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shAs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho bA ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyiraro//
246a3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dul ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dul ba med pa'i nyid kyi phyir
246a4(mdo 'grel): ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// ri ba
246a5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nI sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrar brjod pa da migasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab
246a6(mdo 'grel): 'byoraro gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs dang gzugs brnyan dmigasu med pa nyid
246b1(mdo 'grel): phyiro// rab 'byud+ha gyis gso pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di m+b+ha ste/ shAs dgA N+DI rlo tu phyin pa'ang smrig tu'i ro smra/ phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal hA// mu 'bab pa dmigs meng ba'i phyir ra/
246b2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba/ mtshan ma dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
246b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dmigasu med
246b4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldani 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa
246b5(mdo 'grel): can gyi sems dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
246b6(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ na mkha' dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
247a1(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom ldan 'das pa nyid kyi phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ding ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu/
247a2(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/ rlom sems thams cang shes rab yang dag par bAtsum pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo
247a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyi ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin+da ni// / rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das
247a4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shesngo rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/ 'dod chags dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyi ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ becoMm
247a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'dis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa d+ho gasmra pa med po nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor
247a6(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par de bzhin du mngon por rje/
247b1(mdo 'grel): par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
247b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags dmigasasu mong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
247b3(mdo 'grel): nga yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
247b4(mdo 'grel): mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
247b5(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ yong su rtogs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
247b6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigasu medo pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasa'adi lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
248a1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba
248a2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol
248a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchog tu 'dzin pa
248a4(mdo 'grel): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lnga pa/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bac+doM mA ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
248a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigasu meng pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
248a6(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ongs 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal bya ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad ma dmigs su med
248b1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ chos thams cad
248b2(mdo 'grel): na mkha'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// dpe 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni martag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
248b3(mdo 'grel): pa chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
248b4(mdo 'grel): bka' stsalnga pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
248b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
248b6(mdo 'grel): papo'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan
249a1(mdo 'grel): nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
249a2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlung stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlung gi chos dmigasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
249a3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skyel pa/ phyi'i chos dmigasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
249a4(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
249a5(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mig su sde pa nyid kyi phyi ro pa 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
249a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
249b1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcoM
249b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa gnyisasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//
249b3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmi
249b4(mdo 'grel): susu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
249b5(mdo 'grel): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsolnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
249b6(mdo 'grel): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
250a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus
